Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Cleverly \Clev"er*ly\, adv. In a clever manner. [1913 Webster]
Never was man so clever absurd. --C. Smart. [1913 Webster]
cleverly adv : in a clever manner; "they were cleverly arranged"; "a smartly managed business" [syn: {smartly}]
